SA07n936:3: abhigamya śivena cakṣuṣā śramaṇaḥ kaściduvāca maitrayā ||1 ||
SA07n936:4: kimidaṃ mukhamaśrudurdinaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ vivṛṇoti te tamaḥ |
SA07n936:5: dhṛtimehi niyaccha vikriyāṃ na hi bāṣpaśca śamaśca śobhate ||2 ||
SA07n936:6: dvividhā samudeti vedanā niyataṃ cetasi deha eva ca |
SA07n936:8: tadiyaṃ yadi kāyikī rujā bhiṣaje tūrṇamanūnamucyatām |
SA07n936:10: atha duḥkhamidaṃ manomayaṃ vada vakṣyāmi yadatra bheṣajam |
SA07n936:12: nikhilena ca satyamucyatāṃ yadi vācyaṃ mayi saumya manyase |
SA07n936:13: gatayo vividhā hi cetasāṃ bahuguhyāni mahākulāni ca ||6 ||
SA07n936:14: iti tena sa coditastadā vyavasāyaṃ pravivakṣurātmanaḥ |
SA07n936:15: avalambya kare kareṇa taṃ praviveśānyatarad vanāntaram ||7 ||
SA07n936:16: atha tatra śucau latāgṛhe kusumodgāriṇi tau niṣedatuḥ |
SA07n936:20: sadṛśaṃ yadi dharmacāriṇaḥ satataṃ prāṇiṣu maitracetasaḥ |
SA07n936:21: adhṛtau yadiyaṃ hitaiṣitā mayi te syāt karuṇātmanaḥ sataḥ ||10 ||
SA07n936:22: ata eva ca me viśeṣataḥ pravivakṣā kṣamavādini tvayi |
SA07n936:23: na hi bhāvamimaṃ calātmane kathayeyaṃ bruvate'pyasādhave ||11 ||
SA07n936:24: tadidaṃ śrṛṇu me samāsato na rame dharmavidhāvṛte priyām |
SA07n936:26: vanavāsasukhāt parāṅmukhaḥ prayiyāsā gṛhameva yena me |
SA07n936:27: na hi śarma labhe tayā binā nṛpatirhīna ivottamaśriyā ||13 ||
SA07n936:28: atha tasya niśamya tadvacaḥ priyabhāryābhimukhasya śocataḥ |
SA07n936:30: kṛpaṇaṃ bata yūthalālaso mahato vyādhabhayād viniḥsṛtaḥ |
SA07n936:32: vihagaḥ khalu jālasaṃvṛto hitakāmena janena mokṣitaḥ |
SA07n936:35: jalatarṣavaśena tāṃ punaḥ saritaṃ grāhavatīṃ titīrṣati ||17 ||
SA07n936:36: śaraṇe sabhujaṅgame svapan pratibuddhena pareṇa bodhitaḥ |
SA07n936:37: taruṇaḥ khalu jātavibhramaḥ svayamugraṃ bhujagaṃ jighṛkṣati ||18 ||
SA07n936:39: punaricchati nīḍatṛṣṇayā patituṃ tatra gatavyatho dvijaḥ ||19 ||
SA07n936:40: avaśaḥ khalu kāmamūrcchayā priyayā śyenabhayād vinākṛtaḥ |
SA07n936:41: na dhṛtiṃ samupaiti na hriyaṃ karuṇaṃ jīvati jīvajīvakaḥ ||20 ||
SA07n936:42: akṛtātmatayā tṛṣānvito ghṛṇayā caiva dhiyā ca varjitaḥ |
SA07n936:43: aśanaṃ khalu vāntamātmanā kṛpaṇaḥ śvā punarattumicchati ||21 ||
SA07n936:45: śramaṇaḥ sa hitābhikāṅkṣayā guṇavad vākyamuvāca vipriyam ||22 ||
SA07n936:47: upapannamalabdhacakṣuṣo na ratiḥ śreyasi ced bhavettava ||23 ||
SA07n936:52: ramate tṛṣito dhanaśriyā ramate kāmasukhena bāliśaḥ |
SA07n936:53: ramate praśamena sajjanaḥ paribhogān paribhūya vidyayā ||26 ||
SA07n936:55: sadṛśī na gṛhāya cetanā praṇatirvāyuvaśad gireriva ||27 ||
SA07n936:57: upaśāntipathe śive sthitaḥ spṛhayeddoṣavate gṛhāya saḥ ||28 ||
SA07n936:58: vyasanābhihato yathā viśet parimuktaḥ punareva bandhanam |
SA07n936:59: samupetya vanaṃ tathā punargṛhasaṃjñaṃ mṛgayeta bandhanam ||29 ||
SA07n936:60: puruṣaśca vihāya yaḥ kaliṃ punaricchet kalimeva sevitum |
SA07n936:61: sa vihāya bhajeta bāliśaḥ kalibhūtāmajitendriyaḥ priyām ||30 ||
SA07n936:62: saviṣā iva saṃśritā latāḥ parimṛṣṭā iva soragā guhāḥ |
SA07n936:63: vivṛtā iva cāsayo dhṛtā vyasanāntā hi bhavanti yoṣitaḥ ||31 ||
SA07n936:64: pramadāḥ samadā madapradāḥ pramadā vitamadā bhayapradāḥ |
SA07n936:65: iti doṣabhayāvahāśca tāḥ kathamarhanti niṣevaṇaṃ nu tāḥ ||32 ||
SA07n936:66: svajanaḥ svajanena bhidyate suhadaścāpi suhṛjjanena yat |
SA07n936:70: vacanena haranti valgunā niśitena praharanti cetasā |
SA07n936:71: madhu tiṣṭhati vāci yoṣitāṃ hṛdaye hālahalaṃ mahadviṣaśam ||35 ||
SA07n936:72: pradahan dahano'pi gṛhyate viśarīraḥ pavano'pi gṛhyate |
SA07n936:73: kupito bhujago'pi gṛhyate pramadānāṃ tu mano na gṛhyate ||36 ||
SA07n936:74: na vapurvimṛśanti na śriyaṃ na matiṃ nāpi kulaṃ na vikramam |
SA07n936:76: na vaco madhuraṃ na lālanaṃ smarati strī na ca sauhṛdaṃ kvacit |
SA07n936:78: adadatsu bhavanti narmadāḥ pradadatsu praviśanti vibhramam |
SA07n936:80: guṇavatsu caranti bhartṛvad guṇahīneṣu caranti putravat |
SA07n936:82: viṣayād viṣayāntaraṃ gatā pracaratyeva yathā hṛtāpi gau |
SA07n936:85: api bibhrati caiva yantraṇā na tu bhāvena vahanti sauhṛdam ||42 ||
SA07n936:86: ramayanti patīn kathañcana pramadā yāḥ patidevatāḥ kvacit |
SA07n936:87: calacittatayā sahastraśo ramayante hṛdayaṃ svameva tāḥ ||43 ||
SA07n936:88: śvapacaṃ kila senajitsutā cakame mīnaripuṃ kumudvatī |
SA07n936:93: kathamarhati tāsu paṇḍito hṛdayaṃ sañjayituṃ calātmasu ||46 ||
SA07n936:94: atha sūkṣmamatidvayāśivaṃ laghu tāsāṃ hṛdayaṃ na paśyasi |
SA07n936:95: kimu kāyamasadgṛhaṃ sravad vanitānāmaśuciṃ na paśyasi ||47 ||
SA07n936:98: athavā samavaiṣi tattanūmaśubhāṃ tvaṃ na tu saṃvidasti te |
SA07n936:101: yadi sādhu kimatra yoṣitāṃ sahajaṃ tāsu vicīyatāṃ śuci ||50 ||
SA07n936:103: yadi sā tava sundarī bhavenniyataṃ te'dya na sundarī bhavet ||51 ||
SA07n936:104: stravatīmaśuciṃ spṛśecca kaḥ saghṛṇo jarjarabhāṇḍavat striyam |
SA07n936:107: madanena ca kṛṣyase balādaghṛṇaḥ khalvadhṛtiśca manmathaḥ ||53 ||
SA07n936:109: avicakṣaṇa kiṃ na paśyasi prakṛtiṃ ca prabhavaṃ ca yoṣitām ||54 ||
SA07n936:112: śrutavān matimān kulodgataḥ paramasya praśamasya bhājanam |
SA07n936:113: upagamya yathā tathā punarna hi bhettuṃ niyamaṃ tvamarhasi ||56 ||
SA07n936:115: nidhanamapi varaṃ sthirātmanaścyutavinayasya na caiva jīvitam ||57 ||
SA07n936:120: hāsyo yathā ca paramābharaṇāmbarastrag bhaikṣaṃ caran dhṛtadhanuścalacitramauliḥ |
SA07n936:126: yatholkā hastasthā dahati pavanapreritaśikhā yathā pādākrānto daśati bhujagaḥ krodharabhasaḥ |
SA07n936:127: yathā hanti vyāghraḥ śiśurapi gṛhīto gṛhagataḥ tathā strīsaṃsargo bahuvidhamanarthāya bhavati ||61 ||
SA07n936:129: matvā kāmasukhaṃ nadījalacalaṃ kleśāya śokāya ca |
SA07n936:132: saundarananda mahākāvye “strī-vighna“ nāma aṣṭama sarga samāpta |
